title: SmartGold01
author: SmartGold01
content: Does the Bitcointalk telegram bots notifier suddenly stop functioning?I have been experiencing this afternoon I received few notification yesterday 10:40pm till now I have never received any further notifications. Does it mean the what is happening to forum currently affecting the bots to caused the ceasing of notifying me when I am being mentioned in a post. Who else experiencing same issues? Or do I need to update please I need an answer and what has been the caused of this forum challenges whereby it would take me more than 5 minutes to try to submit a post or comments. I am being worried of the whole situation at hand now as I can not freely make used of this forum as usual.

comments.author: hosemary
comments.body: Such tools need to scrap the posts and the issue is because currently cloudfare doesn't allow anyone to scrape the posts. For more information, read the posts made by LoyceV and TryNinja in another thread. Quote from: LoyceV on July 09, 2023, 03:50:31 AMCloudflare on the forum is blocking scrapers, mine can't do anything either Once in a while Cloudflare goes into impossible-mode. To test: visit the forum in a private browser window, if you see Cloudflare, scrapers won't work.Quote from: TryNinja on July 09, 2023, 04:24:42 AMForum was extra slow today (DDoS?) and cloudflare went full paranoid mode, like LoyceV said. Nothing I can do.

comments.author: RickDeckard
comments.body: Quote from: SmartGold01 on July 09, 2023, 10:11:58 PMDoes the Bitcointalk telegram bots notifier suddenly stop functioning?I have been experiencing this afternoon I received few notification yesterday 10:40pm till now I have never received any further notifications. Does it mean the what is happening to forum currently affecting the bots to caused the ceasing of notifying me when I am being mentioned in a post. Who else experiencing same issues? Or do I need to update please I need an answer and what has been the caused of this forum challenges whereby it would take me more than 5 minutes to try to submit a post or comments. I am being worried of the whole situation at hand now as I can not freely make used of this forum as usual.I believe that Telegram bots are mostly tied to accounts that scrap the forum and then send the information to Telegram (a very simplistic and basic explanation). If you are using TryNinja notification bot you'll see that the scrapping is currently offline[1] due to how Cloudfare is behaving at the moment. This was also confirmed by both LoyceV[2] (who also scraps the forum) as well TryNinja[3]. The best thing that you can do now is just wait until things settle once again.[1]https://status.ninjastic.space/[2]https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5248878.msg62523115#msg62523115[3]https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5248878.msg62525045#msg62525045

comments.author: OcTradism
comments.body: The page Who is online has very little online users today.https://bitcointalk.org/SSI.php?ssi_function=whosOnlineI checked the forum stats page https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=stats and use usernames of most time online users to check, none of them appears at Who is online page. They are like scrapers which blocked by Cloudflare and slow operation of forum recent hours.

comments.author: KingsDen
comments.body: Quote from: OcTradism on July 10, 2023, 02:28:02 AMThe page Who is online has very little online users today.https://bitcointalk.org/SSI.php?ssi_function=whosOnlineI checked the forum stats page https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=stats and use usernames of most time online users to check, none of them appears at Who is online page. They are like scrapers which blocked by Cloudflare and slow operation of forum recent hours.The cloud fare seems to be doing more work than theymos sent him. I perceive that there is a great attack on the forum and there is always a test for secured connection while browsing the forum.It therefore means theymos has disconnected all the third party activities. This has affected the bot notifiers also. I believe this will soon be resolved.

comments.author: Faisal2202
comments.body: This is my first post since yesterday. Because yesterday, I slept three to four hours during the daytime and i didn't thought for a second like why i have not received a single notification yet. Well, yesternight, i came to know about forum situation it was not opening in my side.Today, at 7 AM around (at local time) i woke up and checked the forum was working so i waited since that time, because i was still not receiving any notifications on TG. I am so dependent on TG that until i do not receive any notification i found it difficult to spend time on BTT.Well, because i am tracking boards too, so after receiving no new topic notification i thought everyone else also facing the same problem of not access to BTT. So now i thought i should visit topics manually and members were creating topics and bot was not functional so i fond this topic too. Point is, the whole time i was so dependent on the bot and didn't visited BTT and didn't made any post or reply. This whole things needs some redecoration like any backup system atleast that bot. Because if scrapers a re not allowed then we must be notified about that on BoTs too.

comments.author: joker_josue
comments.body: Quote from: Faisal2202 on July 10, 2023, 12:06:37 PMPoint is, the whole time i was so dependent on the bot and didn't visited BTT and didn't made any post or reply. This whole things needs some redecoration like any backup system atleast that bot. Because if scrapers a re not allowed then we must be notified about that on BoTs too. This might even be a good idea. When the bot fails to scrape, send an informational alert.@TryNinja, Have you ever thought about having something like this in your Telegram bot?

comments.author: babo
comments.body: admit me too (are dipendent from bot)the bot on telegram for see reply or mention is very very useful, without it is a mess undestand who respond to youi hope  all return normal again, i have a simple job for tell me if forum is up or down, and is broken (because return 403)

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: babo on July 10, 2023, 02:09:56 PM~~~i hope  all return normal again, i have a simple job for tell me if forum is up or down, and is broken (because return 403)I guess the TryNinja's  Telegram bot is back online I did receive a few notifications today's from mentions and also for new threads that were created in boards that are been tracked by me. I don't think it's going to last for long though.

comments.body: Quote from: Cantsay on July 10, 2023, 03:35:23 PMQuote from: babo on July 10, 2023, 02:09:56 PM~~~i hope  all return normal again, i have a simple job for tell me if forum is up or down, and is broken (because return 403)I guess the TryNinja's  Telegram bot is back online I did receive a few notifications today's from mentions and also for new threads that were created in boards that are been tracked by me. I don't think it's going to last for long though.i dont know just ask him, because i dont know how work his scrapermy scraper is out and not have save state, so all is lost but is only statistics nothing of special in realbut is bad anyway for all ppl

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: I think everything is functioning fine now,  I have received notification from the bot maybe it's fixed now. I wasn't also receiving notifications for the past 48 hrs.

comments.author: Lida93
comments.body: Quote from: Cantsay on July 10, 2023, 03:35:23 PMQuote from: babo on July 10, 2023, 02:09:56 PM~~~i hope  all return normal again, i have a simple job for tell me if forum is up or down, and is broken (because return 403)I guess the TryNinja's  Telegram bot is back online I did receive a few notifications today's from mentions and also for new threads that were created in boards that are been tracked by me. I don't think it's going to last for long though.Is that so or am I using a different TryNinja telegram bot? As I haven't received any notifying messages from my own end all today. Apart from the mentioned and new threads notifications, I earned a merit today and didn't get a notification from the bot on my telegram unlike it  so I doubt it's back online, the errors still persist. However, I agree with you the fault it's not gonna last for long, hopefully.

comments.author: icalical
comments.body: I use the bot made by TryNinja here https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5248878.0, I didn't get any notification yesterday, however maybe there is actually no one interacting with my posts, but today I already got some notifications again.If you are looking for an alternative, there is another bot created by LoyceV here https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5331343

comments.body: Quote from: Cantsay on July 10, 2023, 03:35:23 PMQuote from: babo on July 10, 2023, 02:09:56 PM~~~i hope  all return normal again, i have a simple job for tell me if forum is up or down, and is broken (because return 403)I guess the TryNinja's  Telegram bot is back online I did receive a few notifications today's from mentions and also for new threads that were created in boards that are been tracked by me. I don't think it's going to last for long though.yep in late night i receive notification too, i think theymos white list iti hope this solution (i mean cloudflare in paranoic mode) is temp, because is a mess.. i have a statistics scraper bot, but is all broken and not beautiful for meof course i cant ask whitelist it because have no sense

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Quote from: babo on July 11, 2023, 07:03:59 AMi think theymos white list itCorrect.Quotei have a statistics scraper bot, but is all broken and not beautiful for meof course i cant ask whitelist it because have no senseWhat do you scrape for this? If it's one page I could get it and share it at loyce.club/other/tmp/babo.html.

comments.author: babo
comments.body: Quote from: LoyceV on July 11, 2023, 07:37:45 AMQuote from: babo on July 11, 2023, 07:03:59 AMi think theymos white list itCorrect.Quotei have a statistics scraper bot, but is all broken and not beautiful for meof course i cant ask whitelist it because have no senseWhat do you scrape for this? If it's one page I could get it and share it at loyce.club/other/tmp/babo.html.ok i tell you what i do, i scrape my last "message" and do statistics about itis only for have graph about me (and other members of forum)i can scrape from other site, no matter for mefor example i scrape "number of chars" sections, presence or not of quote/image etc.. not really useful i think (for all) but i am graph maniacs (i have a grafana dashboard for weather...)

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Quote from: babo on July 11, 2023, 07:41:15 AMok i tell you what i do, i scrape my last "message" and do statistics about itis only for have graph about me (and other members of forum)i can scrape from other site, no matter for meGet your unedited posts, and get the latest scraped post Although the first link (2.5 MB) is a bit large for frequent scraping, especially for users with many posts.
